newsitem.title: SPAIN: La Caixa says lifts Repsol stake to 5.3 pct.
newsitem.headline: La Caixa says lifts Repsol stake to 5.3 pct.

text.p: Spain's Catalan savings bank La Caixa has bought a 0.3 percent stake in energy group Repsol, lifting its total participation to 5.3 percent, a spokesman for the bank said on Wednesday.
The stake increase cost La Caixa 3.8 billion pesetas on the stock market, at a average price per share of 4,070 pesetas.
La Caixa now becomes the third largest shareholder of the oil group, after state holding firm SEPI and Banco Bilbao Vizcaya which has around 7 percent of Repsol.
The government is to sell its 10 percent Repsol stake in early 1997.
